extensionDescription.message: Improves the UI of various Google services, taking these already user-friendly services to the next level.

featuresLabel.description: The label for the collapsible section.

featureSubmitKeyModifier.description: Label for the submit key modifier setting.

featureSubmitKeyModifierDesc.message: Select the modifier key for sending messages when 'Reverse Enter/Submit' is enabled.
featureSubmitKeyModifierDesc.description: Description for the submit key modifier setting.

featureCollapsibleStudioDesc.message: Adds a collapsible section to the 'Studio' panel to hide the feature buttons.

featureButtonEnhancerDesc.message: Changes the default click action of 'Audio' or 'Video' buttons to open the edit prompt instead of auto-generating.

featureNblmEnterKey.description: Feature name for NotebookLM Enter key.

featureNblmEnterKeyDesc.message: Changes 'Enter' to create a new line and uses the configured modifier (Shift/Ctrl) + 'Enter' to submit the prompt.

settingsSaved.description: Confirmation message when settings are saved.

featureGeminiShortcuts.description: Feature name for Gemini tool shortcuts.

featureGeminiShortcutsDesc.message: Show Deep Research and Canvas buttons directly in the prompt bar.

featureGeminiEnterKey.description: Feature name for Gemini Enter key.

featureGeminiEnterKeyDesc.message: Changes 'Enter' to create a new line and uses the configured modifier (Shift/Ctrl) + 'Enter' to submit the prompt.

featureGeminiLayoutWidth.description: Feature name for Gemini content width.

featureGeminiLayoutWidthDesc.message: Set a custom max-width for the chat history and prompt area (760-5000px).

featureChatEnterKey.description: Feature name for Google Chat Enter key.

featureChatEnterKeyDesc.message: Changes 'Enter' to create a new line and uses the configured modifier (Shift/Ctrl) + 'Enter' to send the message.
featureChatEnterKeyDesc.description: Description for Google Chat Enter key.

featureSyncAllSources.description: Feature name for syncing all sources.

featureSyncAllSourcesDesc.message: Cycles through all sources in the open NotebookLM and clicks the sync button if updates are available.
featureSyncAllSourcesDesc.description: Description for syncing all sources feature.

syncingCompleteAlert.message: Check and sync of all sources completed.

syncingErrorNoTab.message: NotebookLM tab not found. Please open NotebookLM first.
syncingErrorNoTab.description: Error when tab is not found.

syncingErrorScript.message: Script not loaded. Please reload the NotebookLM page.
syncingErrorScript.description: Error when content script is not loaded.

syncingOverlayWarning.message: Please do not operate the screen.

syncingResultNone.description: Message when no sources were updated

errorNoSourcesFound.message: No sources found. Please ensure the left sidebar is visible.
errorNoSourcesFound.description: Error when no sources are found
